text: Do you need help? We can get you rest and a bed if you want.
Alright then, follow me. The village is right ahead.
Hey, what's taking you so long?
What are you so slow for?
No, come on, you have to be exhausted! Follow me, the village is right ahead.
Oi, Howzit. Welcome to <TOWNNAME>, traveler. What is your name?
So <PLAYERNAME>, what was your destination in this sorrow woods?
